channel.title: All Registered Polls for the European Parliament
channel.description: All Registered Polls for the European Parliament

item.title: Opinion Poll by Voxmeter for Ritzau, 15–21 April 2019 – Seat Projections for the Parties
item.description:
• Socialdemokraterne (S&D): 4–6 seats
  • Dansk Folkeparti (EAPN): 2–3 seats
  • Venstre (ALDE): 3 seats
  • Enhedslisten–De Rød-Grønne (GUE/NGL): 1–2 seats
  • Liberal Alliance (ALDE): 0–1 seats
  • Alternativet (Greens/EFA): 0 seats
  • Radikale Venstre (ALDE): 0–1 seats
  • Socialistisk Folkeparti (Greens/EFA): 0–1 seats
  • Det Konservative Folkeparti (EPP): 0–1 seats
  • Kristendemokraterne (EPP): 0 seats
  • Nye Borgerlige (*): 0 seats
  • Klaus Riskær Pedersen (*): 0 seats
